txt.en: 'Hit first with the shield, then follow through with the blade. No, no don't let your shield raise up to expose your flank.'
'Excellent work men. You there, don't let your bow fall so soon; follow through!'
'Don't just pull with your arms, pull with your whole back. Good, good!'
'You and your fellows burned down my farm!'
'I haven't any idea who you are! I've never seen you before in my life.'
'What's that old dodger talking about? We don't need his advice. He's never hit a target at sixty paces in his life!'
'You've burned so many farms, I'm not surprised you don't remember them all!'
'I swear to you, I don't recognize you.'
'Well, you look exactly like the men who burned my farm, you and your friend here!'
'Don't bring me in to this! I don't know either of you.'
'You ought not to be hitting him. Leave the punishment to the constable and his men.'
'What do you little folk know, in your silly, little holes.'
